Title: Windows preview version green screen, I'm a little worried.
Description: ![]() I opened the software and suddenly encountered a blue screen crash, then my laptop automatically restarted and returned to normal. Should I be concerned? Or should I roll back to the previous system?
EnhancedContent: I opened the software and suddenly encountered a blue screen crash, then my laptop automatically restarted and returned to normal. Should I be concerned? Or should I roll back to the previous system?
Author: MiloShepherd
